headline: Microchip Technology (NasdaqGS:MCHP) Declares Dividends Despite Forecasting US$76 Million Net Loss
summary: Microchip Technology (NasdaqGS:MCHP) showcased a significant 43% price increase over the last month, amid key developments including a series of product innovations and executive changes. On May 9, the company announced guidance detailing anticipated net sales between $1.02 billion and $1.07 billion for Q1 FY2026, with a forecasted net loss, settings its transparency in financial projections, possibly influencing investor sentiment. Concurrent dividend announcements highlight ongoing...

headline: Microchip price target raised to $70 from $60 at Stifel
summary: Stifel analyst Tore Svanberg raised the firm’s price target on Microchip (MCHP) to $70 from $60 and keeps a Buy rating on the shares after fiscal Q4 results were higher than estimates, the fiscal Q1 outlook was above expectations, and management provided an update on its “Nine Point Recovery Plan.” The firm believes Microchip continues to move in the right direction, swiftly executing meaningful changes with immediate and long-term positive effects, the analyst tells investors in a post-earnings
